did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Report on Arcadia Tract, Maricopa County, Arizona: for H.J. Coerver 1923
did.abstract: Report from Engineering Offices, J.B. Lippincott, Los Angeles. The Arcadia Tract is situated on the southern slope of Camelback Mountain, Phoenix, Arizona. Typescript report of improvements and general characteristics of the tract. Includes mounted photographs, four folded maps, and a blueprint.
